revised_title: Chondrosteus: An Extinct Genus of Fish Allied to the Sturionidae
tldr: The author examines the extinct Chondrosteus fish, a prehistoric relative of the Sturionidae family, and describes its external features and skeletal structure. The study confirms Agassiz's classification of the species and highlights its transitional characteristics between the Sturionidae and ganoids. The fish's diet and habitat are also discussed.
